mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shopinfo(des, addr, person_info_id, shop_category_id, area_info_id) VALUES (#{des}, #{addr}, #{personInfo.id}, #{shopCategory.id}, #{area.id})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.des, t.addr, p.id as p_id, p.name as p_name, p.phone as p_phone, p.password as p_password, p.role as p_role, m.id AS p_s_id, m.src AS p_s_src, s.id AS s_id, s.name AS s_name, a.id AS a_id, a.name AS a_name FROM tb_shopinfo t, tb_personinfo p, tb_shop_category s, tb_area a, tb_single_imageinfo m WHERE t.person_info_id=#{personInfoId} AND t.person_info_id = p.id AND t.shop_category_id = s.id AND t.area_info_id = a.id AND p.image_id = m.id

SELECT t.id, t.des, t.addr, p.id as p_id, p.name as p_name, p.phone as p_phone, p.password as p_password, p.role as p_role, m.id AS p_s_id, m.src AS p_s_src, s.id AS s_id, s.name AS s_name, a.id AS a_id, a.name AS a_name FROM tb_shopinfo t, tb_personinfo p, tb_shop_category s, tb_area a, tb_single_imageinfo m WHERE t.person_info_id = p.id AND t.shop_category_id = s.id AND t.area_info_id = a.id AND p.image_id = m.id
